analysis.description:
CarryPublicTokenCrowdsale._preValidatePurchase (/unique_contracts/0x8a734f6adf825c858016e46e1e4af1843e622ece.sol#1041-1110) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(block.timestamp >= openingTime,Currently unavailable to purchase tokens.) (/unique_contracts/0x8a734f6adf825c858016e46e1e4af1843e622ece.sol#1053-1056)
	- capTimestamp <= block.timestamp (/unique_contracts/0x8a734f6adf825c858016e46e1e4af1843e622ece.sol#1080-1101)

elements.expression: require(bool,string)(block.timestamp >= openingTime,Currently unavailable to purchase tokens.)
